PAMGuard is mostly developed and maintained by a small team of research scientists working at the [Sea Mammal Research Unit](https://www.smru.st-andrews.ac.uk/index.html) at the [University of St Andrews](https://www.st-andrews.ac.uk/) in Scotland.
